short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The todo.blue ToDo Planner for Chrome Browser. Manage or create new Tasks very fast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Full ToDo Planner for the Chrome Browser Toolbar.
